StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SelectFormsForSec.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @Sec.onId uniqueiden..er ) AS
SELECT si.[Sec.onItemId], si.[Sec.onId], si.[FriendlyName], si.[Sec.onItemType], f.[FormCfgId], f.[Signed], f.[Valid], f.[Assembly], f.[ClassName], f.[TemplatePdfFileName], f.[TemplateXdpFileName], f.[VersionNumber], f.[IsOQR] FROM [ACP].[Sec.onItem] si INNER JOIN [ACP].[Form] f ON f.[Sec.onItemId] = si.[Sec.onItemId] WHERE si.[Sec.onId] = @Sec.onId AND si.[Sec.onItemType] = 2 ORDER BY [SortOrder]
-- 2 = Form, see Sec.onItemType lookup table for values.
